concept.title: Event types
concept.shortdesc: For each channel in a path, you can gain a deeper understanding of how a market segment engaged in the channel by comparing the different events that occurred in the channel. Event types vary according to channel, and they can be initiated by customers or by your company.

conbody.p: Examples of customer-initiated events include Opened Email, Accepted Offer, and Clicked Link. Examples of company-initiated events include Sent Email, Presented Offer, and Sent Reminder.
The following table shows some of the most common event types for the web, email, and mobile app channels.

table.title: Common event types for the web, email, and mobile application channels
